name: Poly Strike Aircraft War
description:
Destroy the target with your rockets and your smart fuzz. Complete quests and enjoy victory! You can only get rid of the wise manners that your enemies send you. Be careful. Ammunition is limited.

Achievements.

Features:
- Tasks.
- 3 different weapon options.
- Intelligent missile warning system.

Victory is waiting for you!

* This plane attack game with Plane aeroplane, plane and solid geometry.
* Perfect plane crash animation.
* Free Plane evolution.
* Easy Plane driving.
* Funny plane driving simulator.
* Plane battle game.
* Plane escape game from enemy area.
* Plane Flight Sim game.
* Plane idle plan.
* Play with your friends.
* U have a plane pilot?
* Plane radar
* Plane race
